item.title: Bebbington Road Fly tipping, 6th November
item.description:
Constant fly-tipping and rubbish on Bebbington road right next to Conway Primary School. Our premises manager has been dealing with for the past school year but no longer has the capacity. I think we need a long-term solution - signage/camera?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bebbington Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant flytipping and overgrown Ivy/tree., 6th November
item.description:
Overgrown ivy and tree making it impossible to walk on the pavement. Dangerously overhanging the pavement. Looks very heavy under the weight, will break and drop on someone soon. This is also a continuous fly tipping spot, as it is such a dark secluded spot that you can't be seen from! You have to walk into the road to get past. Very dangerous for families and people at night. Especially as it is getting darker earlier and the cars speed up here from verdant lane round the bend. Please do something about this very soon before someone gets hurt, attacked and fly tippers waste all our time again and again!! Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowanhill Road, Catford South, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Carraigeway works not displaying permit notice, 6th November
item.description:
Outisde the rear access to the school in Stanton Close. Traffic management was set up. No contact details of who is carrying out the work or who the works are for. No notice of permit number is displayed either. The road surface just broken up between 2pm-3pm Monday. No works have been carried out since.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanton Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Electrical rubbish by electrical recycling bin, 6th November
item.description:
Literally every day there is new outsize electrical waste by this bin. The bin causes the problem. This is not acceptable, and another solution must be found.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119, Newington Causeway, Elephant and Castle, London
